sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnunitylink ( unity_link_id , unity_link_group , unity_link_nm , unity_link_url , unity_link_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , unity_link_se_code ) VALUES ( #unityLinkId# , #unityLinkGroup# , #unityLinkNm# , #unityLinkUrl# , #unityLinkDc# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() , #unityLinkSeCode# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnunitylink SET unity_link_id = #unityLinkId# , unity_link_group = #unityLinkGroup# , unity_link_nm = #unityLinkNm# , unity_link_url = #unityLinkUrl# , unity_link_dc = #unityLinkDc# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() , unity_link_se_code = #unityLinkSeCode# WHERE 1 = 1 AND unity_link_id = #unityLinkId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnunitylink WHERE 1 = 1 AND unity_link_id = #unityLinkId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT unity_link_id , unity_link_group , unity_link_nm , unity_link_url , unity_link_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , unity_link_se_code FROM comtnunitylink WHERE unity_link_id = #unityLinkId#

SELECT unity_link_id , unity_link_group , unity_link_nm , unity_link_url , unity_link_dc , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm , unity_link_se_code FROM comtnunitylink WHERE 1=1
unity_link_id = #searchKeyword#
unity_link_group LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY unity_link_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnunitylink WHERE 1=1
unity_link_id = #searchKeyword#
unity_link_group LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
